table.name: vtiger_discussionblog
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_discussionblog` ( `discussionblogid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `subject` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`discussionblogid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_discussionblogcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_discussionblogcf` ( `discussionblogid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`discussionblogid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
